title: Managing Change Orders: Minimizing Impact with Agile Project Controls
description: An agile approach to change orders in construction. Emphasizes fast response, clear workflows, and quick integration of changes to minimize project impacts.
content:
Change orders are inevitable in construction, but how they're managed can make the difference between a minor adjustment and a major disruption. An agile approach to change management emphasizes speed, clear communication, and systematic workflows to minimize impact.

This article explores how construction teams are adopting agile project controls to handle change orders more effectively, reducing delays and cost overruns while maintaining project momentum.
